item.title: Senate will try to block California vehicle standards that would phase out gas-powered cars
item.description: The U.S. Senate will move this week to block California from enforcing a series of vehicle emissions standards that are tougher than the federal governmentâ€™s, including first-in-the-nation rules phasing out the sale of new gas-powered cars by 2035.

item.title: Creationism still widespread and science educators still alarmed 100 years post Scopes trial
More severe weather pummels the central US as thousands recover from deadly tornadoes
